title: 8 days left until inactivity - Enough for not getting demoted?
body: Does the actual day(today) counts into this "8 days" (aka Its not enough for not getting demoted) or doesnt it?

replies.body: Don't take the risk, and play your necessary games to prevent inactivity.  You can bookmark our [countdown timer](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748--Nov-8-RANKED-SEASON-END-Click-here-for-details-) to be sure, but it's better to be safe than sorry. Make sure to select EUW for the timer.   Good luck!
